io.github.reggert.reb4j.charclass

Class CharClass.Java

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.reggert.reb4j.charclass.CharClass.Java
  • Enclosing class:
    CharClass

    public abstract static class CharClass.Java
extends Object
    Module containing predefined character classes matching character traits defined by the Character class.
